overview:
Brady Wood is VP Product Marketing at Minted, an online community of independent artists and an e-commerce site that sell crowdsourced and personalizable art, stationery, holiday cards, wedding invitaitons, and Christmas cards at Minted.com.

Previously, Brady was co-founder and VP Marketing and Business Development at Shmoop, an educational website that has been used by tens of millions of students and teachers.

Prior to Shmoop, Brady was Director Product Marketing at Yahoo. In 2005, he founded Yahoo Pride, the company’s LGBT employees group and led a volunteer group that launched Yahoo’s first LGBT-targeted website.

Brady has an MBA from Stanford University and an AB in Public Policy Studies from Duke University, where he graduated cum laude. While an undergrad student at Duke, Brady founded DevilNet, the nation’s first campus online community, in 1996. In 1997, Brady taught a for-credit class at Duke about emerging social media.

relationships.title: VP of Marketing and Business Development
